00022 #ifndef SOURCE_FILE_H
00023 #define SOURCE_FILE_H

00028 #include "FeatureOption.h"

00031 using std::string;
00032 using std::vector;
00033 
00036 class SourceFile
00037 {
00038 public:
00039   SourceFile();
00040   SourceFile(string location);
00041   SourceFile(const SourceFile* refFile);
00042   ~SourceFile();
00043   string GetLocation() const;
00044   bool SetLocation(string location);
00045   string GetCheckSum() const;
00046   void SetCheckSum(string checksum);
00047   const BooleanExpression& GetCondition() const;
00048   void SetCondition(const BooleanExpression& condition);
00049   bool Save(xmlNodePtr parentNode);
00050   bool Load(xmlNodePtr fileNode);
00051   bool IsActive(const FeatureOptionVector& features) const;
00052   bool IsEmbedded() const;
00053   void SetContents(string contents);
00054   bool ExtractContents(string directory);
00055 private:
00057   string mLocation;
00059   string mCheckSum;
00061   BooleanExpression mCondition;
00063   string mContents;
00064 };
00065 
00066 typedef vector<SourceFile *> SourceFileVector;
